description: Discover the best hotels in Ho Tram, Vietnam. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Lush Coastal Vietnam Escape Overlooking the Beach with Four Onsite Restaurants
hotels.description: Adventure to a tranquil haven on one of Vietnam’s most serene stretches of coast with a hideaway at Dhawa Ho Tram Vietnam. Just two hours from Ho Chi Minh City, explore the natural beauty of the verdant forests and the sparkling magic of the beach. Steal views of the sunset from the comfort of Zephyr, the trendy bar slinging coast-front cocktails. When you’re not outside exploring, dine on delicious Mediterranean fare at Azura, or taste-test Vietnamese classics at Nook.

hotels.title: Idyllic Vietnam Beachfront Hideaway Overlooking Unspoilt Greenery
hotels.description: Venture out of Vietnam’s heaving capital and dive deep in the essence of coastal tranquillity at Angsana Ho Tram. Find your inner sense of serenity within verdant, untouched scenery that nudges up against a sparkling, and virtually secluded, coastline. Admire thriving gardens as you laze poolside or get to the heart of the area’s natural beauty with a stroll through waving trees to the magnificent beachfront. After days full of adventure, nourish your body with culinary delights at Nook, or watch the sunset as you enjoy mouthwatering dishes at Azura.

hotels.title: Five-Star Vietnam Beachside Retreat Just 2.5 Hours from Ho Chi Minh City with 16 Restaurants & World-Class Golf Course
hotels.description: Surrounded by the famed sand dunes of one of Asia’s most acclaimed golf courses and the shimmering turquoise waters of the South China Sea, InterContinental Grand Ho Tram, an IHG Hotel offers Las Vegas-style luxury in the heart of Vietnam’s premier entertainment complex. Dine your way across 16 top-notch venues, head to The Bluffs Grand Ho Tram Strip to practice your long game or simply laze the day way by the hotel’s dazzling lagoon-style pool before an afternoon dip in the ocean.
